description: Crispy cauliflower tossed in tangy buffalo sauce with crunchy slaw in soft tortillas, served with carrot and celery sticks.

imagePrompt.base: Hyper-realistic close-up of Buffalo Cauliflower Wraps plated elegantly on a white plate. Pure white studio background, natural window lighting, shallow depth of field. Showcase vibrant colors, gentle steam, and fresh garnish that highlights texture.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Hyper-realistic, slightly elevated close-up of two Buffalo Cauliflower Wraps, one artfully open to reveal the golden, crispy cauliflower and vibrant slaw. Plated on a pristine matte white ceramic plate, accompanied by crisp carrot and celery sticks. Soft, diffused natural light from a window highlights gentle steam and the glossy buffalo sauce. Garnished with fresh chopped chives and a lime wedge, emphasizing texture with shallow depth of field.
